card.title: Welcome
card.text: Welcome to my Alexa Skill. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

voice.intro: Welcome to my Alexa Skill. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

card.title: Welcome
card.text: You enter a room with three doors each with a distinct number on it. Which door would you like to open?

voice.intro: You enter a room with three doors, each with a distinct number on it. Which door would you like to open?

card.title: You lose
card.prompt: If you would like to play again say, "start again." Otherwise you can say "exit skill."

voice.intro: You lose. Better luck next time.
voice.prompt: If you would like to play again say, "start again." Otherwise you can say "exit skill."

voice.intro: This door is locked. Maybe you should try one of the other doors.

card.title: Secret Room
card.text: Congratulations, you've found a secret room. You look around and see a single door with a star on it.
